attributes.action: halt any introduction of random, without cause, 'stop and search' powers for the police as part of anti-terror legislation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Such powers would inevitably drive a wedge between police and public, be self-defeating, and would create even more fertile conditions for home grown terrorism. It would confirm the arrival of a police state and that terrorism had won.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Peacekeer/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
